name: Dead City Killer - Zombie War
description:
Dead City Killer - Zombie War is a real action adventure game in a world riddled with the zombies This epic zombie combat contract killer 3d games contains different modes to play. The survival mode of zombie survival shooter city battle game will test your killing techniques and weapon power.
Features:
Realistic 3D graphics
Easy and simple controls
Horrifying visualization and sounds
Different type of zombies to kill
Different game missions
Variety of guns to choose
